name: Game One: Sword Arena
description:
a little arena game with lots of upgrades

use mouse + wasd or arrow keys/ onscreen joysticks

Looking at the density of my schedule, I am not certain if there will be more future updates (new game +, unlockable items, achievements). I may peruse a new game, depending on if I can find collaborators, support, and/or time. Thank you all for playing. It has brought a lot of happiness seeing something I've made actually received and engaged with in a such a way. :)
